Data Systems Administrator

September 2017 — Present

  • Configure and maintain web applications, internal databases, electronic access control, student meal plans, retail/food service Point-of-Sale, and related systems that support the University's auxiliary operations

  • Perform high-level technical analysis, assess application deficiencies, and refine technical and business processes to ensure adherence to best practices

  • Provide leadership to technical staff by prioritizing work based on student service and business priorities
  • Automate labor-intensive and/or error-prone tasks using scripting and SharePoint-based workflow tools for both technical staff and for client units

  • Configured electronic access control permissions for residential and dining facilities
